verses.roman:
jīvera duḥkha dekhi' mora hṛdaya bidare
sarva-jīvera pāpa prabhu deha' mora śire

synonyms: jīvera—of all conditioned souls; duḥkha dekhi'-by seeing the sufferings; mora—my; hṛdaya—heart; bidare—breaks; sarva-jīvera—of all living entities; pāpa—the sinful reactions; prabhu—My dear Lord; deha'-just put; mora śire—upon my head.
translation: "My Lord, my heart breaks to see the sufferings of all conditioned souls; therefore I request You to transfer the karma of their sinful lives upon my head.
